Complaint 1
路政署署長(Attn: 伍展鴻先生 路政署總工程師/港島)
運輸署署長 (Attn: 梁少江先生 運輸署總工程師/交通工程(港島)):

本人留意到港島多處行車道兩旁的護欄被當局主動移除。顯然此舉與近日的公眾活動有關，但當局不能否定護欄對保護行人的作用，移除欄杆亦不符合運輸署定立的設計標準。

本人對當局有局決定深表擔憂，希望路政署、運輸署及其他相關部門分別解釋作出此決定的基礎，以及護欄被移除後如何確保道路使用者的安全。

由於本人已合理地懷疑道路使用者的安全受到極為嚴重的威脅，請盡快作出解釋，本人亦會因應處方作出的解釋，考慮是否向申訴專員公署投訴。

Director of Highways (Attn: Mr. NG Chin Hung CHE/HK)
Commissioner of Transport (Attn: Mr. LEUNG Siu Kong, Eddie CTE/HK),

I have noticed the fences alongside the driveway in Admiralty and Waichai are being removed by certain government departments, for which it is unknown in the eyes of the public. Despite the fact that the removal of the fences could have been in relations to the recent peaceful demonstrations against the tyrannical government, the fences play a crucial role in safeguarding pedestrians from moving vehicles by separating them. Also, removing the fences is not of the standard and regulation established by the Transport Department.

Therefore, I hereby express my deepest concerns of the aforementioned act that I would like the Transport Department and Highways Department to explain and elaborate in details of the rationales of the aforementioned. And how would the departments ensure the safety of not only the Hong Kong citizens but people from all over the world to walk safely on the street of Hong Kong without the protective fences. Are there any preventive measures after the removal of the fences?

I have reasons to believe the safety of the pedestrians is at stake, hence, I solemnly urged the departments to clarify the aforementioned actions. The response from the departments will be taken into consideration that if I am to further the matter and report it to the Office of The Ombudsman, Hong Kong.

Complaint 2 (呢個要dl埋張相attach俾1823)
路政署署長(Attn: 伍展鴻先生 路政署總工程師/港島)
運輸署署長 (Attn: 梁少江先生 運輸署總工程師/交通工程(港島)):

本人留意到2019年7月17日晚上於銅鑼灣告士打道天橋北行線出口一帶的護欄被當局主動拆除。 本人質疑有關護欄拆除工程是否合乎由路政署所編撰的道路工程的照明、標誌及防護工作守則(下稱「守則」)。根據守則第1.4段，道路工程指在道路上或在道路附近進行的任何挖掘、構造或維修工程或任何其他工程，連同供以下用途的範圍─
（a）貯存物料；
（b）貯存建築業裝置及其運作；及
（c）建造任何與道路工程相關的臨時構築物。
道路交通（交通管制）規例（第374G章）亦同時清楚訂明道路工程負責人須按照有關照明、標誌及防護的規定，豎立及保持豎立訂明的燈具、交通標誌及道路標記，並按照守則所定方式放設。 而從有關圖片得悉，相關道路維修工程並沒有設立適當的照明工具、標誌及防護設備。

本人質疑當局未有充份監督相關工程，已致工人安全及性命受到極為嚴重的威脅，請當局盡快作出,解釋。本人亦會因應當局作出的解釋，考慮是否向申訴專員公署投訴。

Director of Highways (Attn: Mr. NG Chin Hung CHE/HK)
Commissioner of Transport (Attn: Mr. LEUNG Siu Kong, Eddie CTE/HK),

I have noticed the guardrails near the exit of the Gloucester Road North are being removed by the authority on the night of 17th July, 2019. I seriously suspect the procedures of the removing of the guardrails are up to the protocols, Code of Practice for the Lighting, Signing and Guarding of Road Works, hereinafter be called COP, formulated by the Highways Department. Under the Introduction of the COP, definitions 1.4, road works means any excavation, structural or maintenance work or any other work executed on or near the road together with the area for –
(a) the storage of any material;
(b) the storage and operation of any constructional plant; and
(c) the construction of any temporary structure in connection with road works.

From the attached photo, neither proper lightings, signs nor protective measures are employed at the site of the road work. I hold the utmost scepticism that the corresponding authorities are providing appropriate and enough supervision overseeing the road work. The lives of the workers could have been endangered in light of the lack of employment of the safety guideline, therefore, I urged the corresponding authorities to explain the aforementioned work. The response from the departments will be taken into consideration that if I am to further the matter and report it to the Office of The Ombudsman, Hong Kong.

一人一1823
盡公民責任
